name: Cash on Hand (Petty Cash)
description: Physical cash held at various company locations

name: Cash in Operating Bank Account
description: Primary bank account for daily business transactions

name: Cash in Payroll Bank Account
description: Dedicated bank account for employee salary disbursements

name: Cash in Investment Accounts
description: Funds held in short-term liquid investments or fixed deposits

name: Accounts Receivable
description: Amounts owed by customers/distributors

name: Raw Materials Inventory
description: Inventory of chemicals and materials for drug manufacturing

name: Finished Goods Inventory
description: Inventory of completed, marketable pharmaceutical products

name: Property, Plant, & Equipment
description: Manufacturing facilities, lab equipment, and operational equipment

name: Patents and Intellectual Property
description: Intangible assets related to drug formulations and processes

name: Prepaid Expenses
description: Advance payments for insurance, rent, etc.

name: Accounts Payable
description: Amounts owed to suppliers (e.g., raw material vendors)

name: Loans Payable
description: Outstanding loans (e.g., for capital expenditures)

name: Accrued Regulatory Fees
description: Estimated and unpaid fees to regulatory bodies (e.g., FDA, EMA)

name: Common Stock
description: Investment by shareholders in the business

name: Retained Earnings
description: Accumulated profits or losses

name: Drug Sales Revenue
description: Revenue generated from the sale of pharmaceutical products

name: Licensing and Royalty Income
description: Income from licensing out proprietary drug formulations

name: Cost of Goods Manufactured (COGM)
description: Direct costs associated with producing the finished pharmaceutical goods

name: Research & Development (R&D) Expense
description: Costs for discovery and clinical trials

name: Sales and Marketing Expense
description: Costs for promoting and distributing pharmaceutical products

name: General and Administrative Expense
description: Office salaries, utilities, rent, and overhead

name: Amortization Expense - Patents
description: Expensing of intangible assets (patents) over their useful life

name: Regulatory Compliance Expense
description: Costs associated with meeting and maintaining government standards
